body.name: YITAHOME Dresser for Bedroom, Tall Dresser with 8 Drawers, Storage Tower with Fabric Bins, Chest of Drawers for Closet & Living Room - Sturdy Steel Frame, Wooden Top (Dark Grey)
features: VERSATILE STORAGE TOWER- YITAHOME fabric dresser is a clean expression that fits right into your bedroom, living room, hallway, entryway, closet
ROOMY STORAGE SPACE- The tall dresser can stash dresses, socks, pants, shirts etc.; Sizeable top grants all the surface area you need to display framed photos, lamps, and potted plants

STURDY DRESSER FOR BEDROOM- Premium MDF wooden top and reliable metal frame lend immense support & extend shelf life; 4 adjustable plastic legs are for scratch protection and stability on uneven ground
8-DRAWER CHEST - The storage drawer unit features 8 deep drawers which are foldable and removable, as well as easy-to-pull plastic handles; High quality non-woven synthetic fabric is easy to care

SAFE & EASY USE- The double dresser measures 33.9" L x 11.8'' W x 35.4" H; Drawer size: 15.6" L x 11" W x 5.5" H/15.6" L x 11" W x 8.7" H; It’s a breeze to assemble the chest of drawers with instructions included; Recommended to anchor the dresser to the wall for anti-tipping safety

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: I included a before image of the area where I put these units. I was able to fit most of what was in the totes plus some of stuff that was on the shelves above, in boxes, in these drawer units. Now everything is more easily accessible. I was very diligent about finding units that were just below the height of my shelf and wide enough to put two. I wasn’t expecting much from these but I will say, they seem very sturdy, solid, and they’re aesthetically appealing. I wouldn’t hesitate to use these in a bedroom especially if you’re needing something not as deep as traditional furniture and/or needing something budget friendly. These would also be great for extra organization in closets. The handles do seem really cheap but once assembled, you don’t even notice. Also very easy to put together. Putting the handles on was the most time consuming, but absolutely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble. It's a great look and my daughter has her 39' TV on the top.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Budget friendly lightweight clothing storage
reviews.reviewText: Bought this back in 2021.It's not the sturdiest piece of equipment, But it holds on to things better than Target level build it yourself equipment. if you are strictly holding your own clothing in it I recommend buying this. NO issues and the containers are still holding up after all the use and moving we have made with them.Keep in mind I am a minimalist when it comes to furniture so my thoughts on getting drawers is always to maximize storage and minimizing bulk space in my home. These do it fantastic and they are super easy to take apart and move with.They were aproximately 100 dollars before tax. If you need something in a pinch that you won't have to worry about giving away or needing for long use consider this one of your better options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice size, super cute , definitely sturdy and you can mail them too the wall too so it’s not leaning when you fill the drawers up . I love them I got 3 of them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The drawers smell awful, It smells like vomit
reviews.reviewText: You might need two people to built it,To help with the pieces specifically for the drawer handles you're going to need a power drill if you're not strong it helps a lotIt's nice and light weight to move around.Very stable and sturdy. I have a 32in roku t.v. on itDon't force to screw it in, make sure it's tight but don't over do it you'll strip the screws and mess it up.No damage was found or doneIt looks very nice so nice I bought two

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works really well for my kids stuff. Have a 5 and 1 year old.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No bottom base rails!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I don’t know why in the world they keep forgetting to send bottom rail to make it sturdy. This is my third one. I had to return 2 ( no rails) it’s a great product to buy very spacious very open but they are missing the parts to put it together to make it what it needs to be. Also the black boxes that you see on the bottom of the dresser is the boxes they came, and I also ordered some black wrapping paper because these organize dressers are so low and I wanted a little height.
